name: Faerie's Strike

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Nature Magic or the ability to cast druid or ranger spells; Vital Strike, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks.

sections.text: When you use Vital Strike (or Improved Vital Strike or Greater Vital Strike), the creature you hit with the attack must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom modifier) or be illuminated as if by faerie fire for 1 minute. You can use this benefit a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: Nature Magic or the ability to cast druid or ranger spells
description: Ephemeral wisps of nature spirits dance about those you strike.
